title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, November 19, 2020
description: On this day in 1956, Ernest Hemingway recovered a trunk from the Hôtel Ritz Paris that contained the Paris-era journals that would become his memoir.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this day in 1956, Ernest Hemingway recovered a trunk from the Hôtel Ritz Paris that contained the Paris-era journals that would become his memoir.
